DOC.brief_summary: This study perform compare cost anesthetic technique sevoflurane ( low fresh gas flow balance anesthesia ) versus propofol ( target control infusion [ TCI ] ) versus propofol induction sevoflurane maintenance anesthesia subject undergo elective laparoscopic surgery predict anesthesic use 1 3 hour duration .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Pharmaceutical Economics Efficacy Sevoflurane With Low Fresh Gas Flow Balanced Anesthesia , Propofol Target Controlled Infusion Anesthesia Propofol Induction Sevoflurane Maintenance Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: Three hundred thirty-six subject enrol study . Two subject , one treat propofol induction maintenance one treat propofol induction sevoflurane maintenance include study participation since information available two subject .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Men woman , age 18 65 2 . ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) physical status ( requirement subject 's physical status ) : I II 3 . Body mass index ( weight/height^2 ) 16 30 kg/m^2 4 . Elective laparoscopic surgery require general anesthesia manage endotracheal intubation 5 . Duration anesthesia use great equal 1 hour , le 3 hour length . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Hypersensitivity unusual response halogenated anesthetic . 2 . History significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , central nervous system muscular disease . 3 . Preoperative cognitive dysfunction disable neuropsychiatric disorder . 4 . Need emergency surgery surgery require additional regional anesthetic technique . 5 . Need intracranial surgery , cardiosurgery thoracic surgery . 6 . Subjects inability cooperate anesthetist administration anesthetic agent . 7 . Personal familial history malignant hyperthermia . 8 . Females either pregnant breast feeding .
